item.title: 据 AFR 报道，澳大利亚 Optus 正考虑向 Nine 出售体育流媒体服务
item.description: 据《澳大利亚金融评论报》（AFR）周一报道，新加坡电信旗下的澳大利亚第二大电信运营商 Optus 正寻求将其体育流媒体平台 Optus Sport 出售给媒体公司 Nine Entertainment。【原文：Singapore Telecommunications-owned Optus, Australia's No. 2 telecom carrier, is looking to sell its sports streaming platform Optus Sport to media house Nine Entertainment , the Australian Financial Review (AFR) reported on Monday.】

item.title: 高盛称，铜市场认为美国在第一季度末加征 10%关税的可能性为一半
item.description: 高盛（Goldman Sachs）周一表示，铜市场的定价显示，到今年第一季度末，美国对铜征收 10%关税的可能性约为 50%。【原文：Goldman Sachs on Monday said the copper market is pricing in odds of about 50% that there will be a 10% U.S. tariff on the metal by the end of the first quarter of this year.】

item.title: 特朗普提议美国拥有 TikTok 50% 的股份后，中国敦促企业独立决策
item.description: 周一，中国外交部在回答有关美国当选总统唐纳德-特朗普提议美国持有 TikTok 50%股份的问题时表示，公司应 "自主决定 "其运营和交易事宜。【原文：China's foreign ministry said on Monday companies should "decide independently" on matters of their operations and deals, responding to a question about U.S. President-elect Donald Trump proposing a 50% U.S. ownership in TikTok.】

item.title: 报告称中国商飞计划今年将C919喷气机产能提升至50架
item.description: 中国商飞公司的一位高管告诉一家得到上海市政府支持的媒体，中国商飞公司计划今年将国产 C919 单通道飞机的产能提高到 50 架。【原文：Chinese planemaker COMAC plans to raise production capacity for its homegrown C919 single-aisle planes to 50 this year, a COMAC executive told a media outlet supported by the Shanghai government.】

item.title: 中国投资者扎堆桥水式基金，期待特朗普回归
item.description: 中国的对冲基金管理公司正竞相推出以桥水联合基金公司（Bridgewater Associates）广受欢迎的 "全天候 "策略为蓝本的产品，以满足投资者对唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）第二次担任美国总统期间预期波动性的缓冲需求。【原文：Chinese hedge fund managers are racing to launch products styled on Bridgewater Associates' popular "All Weather" strategy, to meet hot investor demand for a cushion against expected volatility during Donald Trump's second U.S. presidency.】

item.title: 台湾仁宝、英业达酝酿美国扩张以对抗特朗普关税
item.description: 台湾合同笔记本电脑制造商仁宝和英业达的高管表示，他们可能会进军美国，德克萨斯州将是首选地点之一，因为他们已经为当选总统唐纳德-特朗普威胁征收关税做好了准备。【原文：Taiwanese contract laptop makers Compal and Inventec may expand into the United States with Texas eyed as one of the top locations, their executives say, as they prepare for President-elect Donald Trump's threatened tariffs.】

item.title: 分析师和投资者称，维旺迪的新 "星系 "公司需要更多时间解释战略
item.description: 分析师和投资者表示，维旺迪管理层和一些新分拆出来的公司--Canal+、Havas 和路易-哈歇特集团--的老板们需要更清晰地阐述他们的战略，以说服投资者分手是值得的。【原文：Vivendi management and bosses of some of its newly spun out companies - Canal+, Havas and Louis Hachette Group - need to lay out more clearly their strategies to convince investors the break-up was worth it, analysts and investors said.】

item.title: 特朗普的回归为西方企业退出俄罗斯的困境增添了新的转机
item.description: 持有还是放弃？【原文：Hold or fold?】

item.title: 早间竞价市场先生遇上特朗普 2.0
item.description: Tom Westbrook 展望欧洲和全球市场的未来一天【原文：A look at the day ahead in European and global markets from Tom Westbrook】

item.title: 在欧美国企业担心特朗普上台后关系恶化
item.description: 周一公布的一项调查显示，在欧洲开展业务的十家美国公司中有九家认为跨大西洋经济关系在未来几年将恶化，而关税等即将上任的美国总统唐纳德-特朗普的预期政策是主要原因。【原文：Nine out of 10 U.S. firms operating in Europe believe transatlantic economic relations will worsen in coming years, with the expected policies of incoming U.S. President Donald Trump such as tariffs the chief cause, according to a survey published on Monday.】

item.title: 印度 Wipro 公司迎来四年来最好的一天，与 IT 同行的需求复苏希望相呼应
item.description: 周一，印度排名第四的 IT 服务公司 Wipro 的股价飙升约 8%，创下近四年来的最佳表现，此前该公司与其他同行一样发出了需求复苏的信号。【原文：Wipro's shares surged about 8% on Monday, set for their best day in nearly four years, after India's No. 4 IT services company joined its peers in signaling a revival in demand.】

item.title: 特朗普的新加密代币在其就职典礼前跃升
item.description: 唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）新发行的加密货币周一市值飙升至 90 亿美元，在美国当选总统重返白宫前几个小时吸引了数十亿美元的交易量。【原文：Donald Trump's newly minted cryptocurrency soared on Monday to top $9 billion in market value, drawing in billions in trading volume just hours ahead of the U.S. President-elect's return to the White House.】

item.title: 保守派有影响力人士在 TikTok 赞助的特朗普就职典礼派对上庆祝
item.description: 在周日为即将上任的唐纳德-特朗普总统和他曾试图禁止的视频共享平台举行的就职典礼上，TikTok 耳罩和 MAGA 帽子成为派对参加者的装饰。【原文：TikTok earmuffs and MAGA hats adorned partygoers at Sunday's inauguration celebration for the incoming President Donald Trump and the video-sharing platform he once tried to ban.】

item.title: 中国国家副主席在特朗普就职典礼前会见埃隆-马斯克
item.description: 据官方新华社周一报道，中国国家副主席韩正周日在华盛顿特区会见了特斯拉首席执行官埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）和美国商界的其他成员。【原文：China's Vice President Han Zheng met on Sunday with Tesla CEO Elon Musk and other members of the U.S. business community in Washington D.C., the official Xinhua news agency reported on Monday.】

item.title: 韩国为应对特朗普政策提供有史以来最大规模的出口融资支持
item.description: 在唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）即将宣誓就任其第二任总统之际，韩国周一承诺为出口商提供创纪录的融资支持，以减轻美国贸易政策变化带来的任何负面影响。【原文：South Korea pledged on Monday a record amount of financing support for exporters to mitigate any negative impact from changes in U.S. trade policies as Donald Trump was poised to be sworn in for his second presidency.】

item.title: 日本央行准备将利率上调至 17 年来最高水平
item.description: 如果美国当选总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）上任后不出现任何市场震荡，预计日本央行将于周五提高利率，此举将使短期借贷成本升至2008年全球金融危机以来从未见过的水平。【原文：The Bank of Japan is expected to raise interest rates on Friday barring any market shocks when U.S. President-elect Donald Trump takes office, a move that would lift short-term borrowing costs to levels unseen since the 2008 global financial crisis.】

item.title: 律师告诉法庭，碧桂园预计将于 2 月与债权人达成协议
item.description: 中国房地产公司碧桂园拖欠债务，该公司的律师周一告诉香港一家法院，预计下个月将与债权人达成一致条款。【原文：Chinese property company Country Garden , which has defaulted on debt repayment obligations, expects to reach agreeable terms with creditors next month, the firm's lawyer told a Hong Kong court on Monday.】

item.title: 市场等待特朗普就职，美元持稳
item.description: 本周一，美元在两年多高点附近徘徊，因为唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）将重新入主白宫并发表就职演说，这将是投资者希望解读其近期政策的主要焦点。【原文：The dollar was hovering near a more than two-year high at the start of a pivotal week on Monday, as Donald Trump re-enters the White House with an inauguration speech that will be of primary focus for investors hoping to decipher his immediate policies.】

item.title: 特朗普第二任期来临，美元走强，股市攀升
item.description: 周一，美元坚挺，亚洲股市谨慎向好，因为投资者在等待唐纳德-特朗普就任第二任总统后的头几个小时里预期将宣布的一系列政策，并期待日本在本周末加息。【原文：The dollar was firm and Asia's stock markets were cautiously positive on Monday as investors waited for an expected flurry of policy announcements in the first hours of Donald Trump's second presidency and eyed a rate hike in Japan at the end of the week.】

item.title: 俄罗斯制裁引发的供应担忧持续，油价攀升
item.description: 过去两周，华盛顿因乌克兰战争对俄罗斯能源行业实施了两轮制裁，供应担忧持续存在，油价周一有所回升。【原文：Oil prices recovered on Monday as supply concerns persisted after Washington imposed two rounds of sanctions in the past two weeks on Russia's energy sector over the Ukraine war.】

item.title: 中国维持基准贷款利率不变
item.description: 由于人民币走软限制了中国政府的货币宽松政策，中国周一维持基准贷款利率月度定盘价不变。【原文：China left benchmark lending rates unchanged at the monthly fixing on Monday, as a weakening yuan has limited Beijing's monetary easing efforts.】

item.title: 工厂投资强劲，日本 11 月机械订单超出预期
item.description: 日本政府周一公布的数据显示，日本 11 月份核心机械订单环比增长 3.4%，超出分析师预期，这表明在央行本周晚些时候进行利率审查之前，资本支出有所恢复。【原文：Japan's core machinery orders rose 3.4% in November from the previous month to beat analysts' forecast, government data showed on Monday, signalling a recovery in capital expenditure ahead of a central bank interest rate review later this week.】

item.title: 资产管理公司 VanEck 预计，随着特朗普的回归，国防领域将出现增长
item.description: 投资公司和 ETF 发行商 VanEck 表示，在唐纳德-特朗普重返白宫之前，对领先的国防行业交易所交易基金（ETF）的需求一直在增长。【原文：Demand for a leading defence sector exchange-traded fund (ETF) has been growing ahead of the return of Donald Trump to the White House, said investment company and ETF issuer VanEck.】

item.title: 工会表示，好市多团队工人投票批准在全美范围内举行罢工
item.description: 车队工会周日表示，美国零售商好市多批发公司（Costco Wholesale）的会员投票赞成在全国范围内举行罢工，因为他们已进入最后一轮谈判，以便在 1 月 31 日截止日期前达成新合同。【原文：Teamsters said on Sunday its members at U.S. retailer Costco Wholesale voted in favor of a nationwide strike, as they entered a final round of talks to reach a new contract ahead of a Jan. 31 deadline.】

item.title: 美国 TikTok 爱好者如释重负，希望 "魔力 "随着应用程序的恢复而回归
item.description: 虽然对 TikTok 的未来仍有疑问，但一些用户感叹他们对政府的信任将一去不复返。【原文：While questions linger about the future of TikTok, some users lament their trust in the government will never be the same.】

item.title: 澳大利亚明星娱乐公司公布第二季度亏损报告
item.description: 澳大利亚陷入困境的赌场运营商 Star Entertainment 周一公布了第二季度亏损报告，这增加了该公司未来改造和扭亏为盈的不确定性。【原文：Australia's troubled casino operator Star Entertainment reported a second-quarter loss on Monday, adding to the rising uncertainty about its future revamp and earnings turnaround.】

item.title: 早间竞价就职典礼引发的谨慎情绪为风险复苏降温
item.description: 亚洲市场前瞻【原文：A look at the day ahead in Asian markets.】

item.title: TikTok 表示正在恢复在美国的服务
item.description: TikTok 周日表示，它正在恢复其在美国的服务，并补充说它将与共和党当选总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）合作制定一个长期解决方案，让这款中国人拥有的流行社交媒体应用继续留在美国。【原文：TikTok said it was in the process of restoring its service in the U.S. on Sunday, adding it will work with Republican President-elect Donald Trump on a long-term solution that keeps the popular Chinese-owned social media app in the United States.】

item.title: 爱德曼全球调查显示，经济不满助长了对敌对行动的支持
item.description: 据传播公司爱德曼（Edelman）在全球范围内进行的一项民意调查显示，60%的人对经济的担忧已经升级为不满，许多人认为有必要采取暴力等敌对行动来实现变革。【原文：Economic fears have escalated into grievances among 60% of people, with many believing hostile actions such as violence can be necessary to bring about change, according to a global poll by communications firm Edelman.】

item.title: 特朗普安全顾问不排除中国继续拥有 TikTok 的可能性
item.description: Mike Waltzs 说，用户数据必须在美国得到保护和存储。【原文：Mike Waltzs said user data would have to be protected and stored in the U.S.】
